com.almasb.fxgl.audio

Interface AudioPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NotificationListener, UpdateEventListener, UserProfileSavable

    public interface AudioPlayer
extends UserProfileSavable, UpdateEventListener, NotificationListener
    General audio player service that supports playback of sound and music objects. It can also control volume of both.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • playSound

        default void playSound(String assetName)
        Convenience method to play the sound given its filename.
        Parameters:
        assetName - name of the sound file

      • playMusic

        default void playMusic(String assetName)
        Convenience method to play the music given its filename.
        Parameters:
        assetName - name of the music file

      • playSound

        void playSound(Sound sound)
        Plays given sound based on its properties.
        Parameters:
        sound - sound to play

      • stopSound

        void stopSound(Sound sound)
        Stops playing given sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - sound to stop

      • stopAllSounds

        void stopAllSounds()
        Stops playing all sounds.

      • playMusic

        void playMusic(Music music)
        Plays given music based on its properties. If the music has been paused, you need to call resumeMusic(Music) instead.
        Parameters:
        music - music to play
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the music is already playing / paused

      • pauseMusic

        void pauseMusic(Music music)
        Pauses given music if it was previously started with playSound(Sound). It can then be restarted by resumeMusic(Music).
        Parameters:
        music - music to pause

      • resumeMusic

        void resumeMusic(Music music)
        Resumes previously paused pauseMusic(Music) music.
        Parameters:
        music - music to resume

      • stopMusic

        void stopMusic(Music music)
        Stops currently playing music. It cannot be restarted using resumeMusic(Music). The music object needs to be started again by playMusic(Music).
        Parameters:
        music - music to stop

      • pauseAllMusic

        void pauseAllMusic()
        Pauses all currently playing music. These can be resumed using resumeAllMusic().

      • resumeAllMusic

        void resumeAllMusic()
        Resumes all currently paused music.

      • stopAllMusic

        void stopAllMusic()
        Stops all currently playing music. The music cannot be restarted by calling resumeAllMusic(). Each music object will need to be started by playMusic(Music).
